Html:
I succesfully created windows desktop application, but when I tried to publish it to another computer running Windows 8.1 with no VS installed, it gave error during installation:

Could not load file or assembly "WebCamLib, Version=0.0.0.0. Culture=neutral, Public Key Token=null" or one of its dependencies. The system cannot find the file specified

I built my application using Windows 7 & VS 2012, configuration manager for solution: platform x86, target CPU x86, Net Framework 4.0 (same error using 4.5)
Can anyone help ?

Please Confirm add webcamLib.dll to your Debug folder.

RADU MEDIA.
